translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 任務における要望などを言っても構いませんか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: May I express any requests regarding the mission?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむ、許す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, I permit it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言ってみろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Go ahead and say it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統、わたくしを出来るだけ困難な……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Commander, please assign me the most difficult...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もし許されるなら死地へと赴くような、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If allowed, a mission that leads me to a deadly place,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな任務をお与え下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please give me such a mission.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう、自ら死地に赴くことを望むか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh? You wish to go to a deadly place voluntarily?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 余人には到底不可能な
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fulfilling difficult tasks that no one else could possibly do,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 困難な任務を果たすことこそがわたくしの願い！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is my wish!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん、平和を実現する為なら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, so you're willing to risk your life to achieve peace,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 命すら惜しくないって奴か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you one of those who don't care about their life?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リックもそうだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick is like that too,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスの兵士は真面目なのが多いよな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many of the soldiers of Leazas are quite serious people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、わたくしは平和には興味ありません！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I am not interested in peace!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただ、英雄となりたいだけです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just want to become a hero!
...Huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「困難な任務をこなし、英雄ともてはやされ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Completing difficult missions and being hailed as a hero!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 称賛され、褒められ、勲章とかもらい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Praised, complimented, and awarded medals!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてあわよくば女の子にモテモテに！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And if possible, to be popular with girls!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わたくしの考えることは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is all I think about!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけでありますれば！」
バサーッと、オーギルは深々と頭を下げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a flourish, Ogil bowed deeply.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんというか……その……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How should I put it... um...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こういった方なのです……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the kind of person he is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なるほど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-I see...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんと俗っぽく、そして正直な奴……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What a worldly and honest guy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ！　人を助けられて、かつ正直な人間に！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha! I was strictly raised by my parents to be a helpful and honest person!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この二つだけは親にこっぴどく躾けられました！」
「軍内でも評判で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm also well-known within the military...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その、黙っていればモテモテなのに、と……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, they say I would be popular if I kept quiet...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ですが、嘘をつくわけにはいきますまい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, I cannot lie.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わたくしは己の信念を貫き！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will follow my own beliefs!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでいてモテモテの英雄になりたいのです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And become a beloved hero at the same time!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無論、その為の努力を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, I put all my effort into that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 惜しむ気は一切ございません！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without any hesitation!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なのに、ちっともモテない！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yet, I am not popular at all!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、この世はなんて無情なのか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, how cruel this world is!
Y-Yes...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、大体どんな奴かは分かった……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I roughly understand what kind of person you are...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すんごい俗っぽくて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Very worldly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すんごい正直者なんだな、こいつ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and extremely honest, this guy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ところでアールコート殿は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, Lord Arcourt,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日も可憐でありますな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you are lovely as always today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴方の才学非凡な知識溢れる言葉には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your words, filled with exceptional talent and profound knowledge,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わたくしめも感動を禁じ得ず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: move me deeply,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方が喋る度涼やかな風が吹く錯覚が致します」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and whenever you speak, I feel an illusion of a cool breeze.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっ、えっ、えっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh, eh, eh!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうか結婚して下さい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please, marry me!

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すんごい正直者なんだな、こいつ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and extremely honest, this guy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ところでアールコート殿は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, Lord Arcourt,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日も可憐でありますな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you are lovely as always today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴方の才学非凡な知識溢れる言葉には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your words, filled with exceptional talent and profound knowledge,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わたくしめも感動を禁じ得ず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: move me deeply,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方が喋る度涼やかな風が吹く錯覚が致します」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and whenever you speak, I feel an illusion of a cool breeze.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっ、えっ、えっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh, eh, eh!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうか結婚して下さい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please, marry me!
